English: A film on the Isle of Man was shown on RTE 2 in April. Made by Bob Quinn of Cinegael it was in Manx and Irish, with English sub-titles and concentrated on the Manx Gaelic tradition. It is hoped a video tape showing can be arranged on Mann later this year.

Manx: Va scannane foaysagh er Ellan Vannin er Radio Teilifis Eireann er-y-gherrid. Ren "Cinegael" yn scannane as va yn taggloo ayns Gaeilge lesh fo-screeuyn ayns Baarle. Honnick shin reayrtyn feer-vie jeh'n ellan as seihll ny baatyn. Va coontey mie er Manannan Mac Lir Jee yn aarkey. She eshyn hug e ennym da'n ellan.

Ren yn scannane goll gys thieyn-oast as honnick shin ny kiaulleyderyn cloie kiaulleeaght Vanninagh as ad loayrt Gailck. Reir yn scannane, ta 60 dooinney as yn Ghailck oc ayns yn ellan nish. Ga dy vel yn earroo shen beg, ec yn traa cheddin, shegin dooin cooinaghtyn dy row yn chengey bunnys marroo. Foddee shin gra dy vel goll-er-oai mie jeant ec mooinjer Vannin.

Ta ainjys mie ain er Brian Mac Stoyll voish "CARN", as gyn ourys va ayrn mooar echey sy scannane. Shegin dooin gra dy row yn scannane shoh feer-vie as hug eh coontey braew dooin er Ellan Vannin as chengey ny mayrey.
